data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lorence, David H., Butaud, Jean-Francois (2011): A reassessment of Marquesan Ochrosia and Rauvolfia (Apocynaceae) with two new combinations. PhytoKeys 4: 95-107, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.4.1599, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.4.1599
